title: This program lets you cast YouTube videos to your TV using command line
content:
The ability to wirelessly cast a smartphone’s screen to other devices like a TV isn’t that difficult of an endeavor these days. In fact, when it comes to casting a YouTube video from your phone or tablet to your Smart TV, the little icon takes care of everything — from device discovery to seamless context

The post This program lets you cast YouTube videos to your TV using command line appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Looking for an alternative way of casting YouTube videos to your TV? Try ytcast — an open source program that allows you to cast via CLI.
